<details className="config-field" data-expandable="true" open>
<summary>

##### `fieldRef` <span className="config-field-required" data-required="false">required</span> <span className="config-field-type">object</span> <span className="config-field-default"></span> <span className="config-field-enum"></span> {#runners-spec-clusterRef-podTemplate-spec-env-valueFrom-fieldRef}

Selects a field of the pod: supports metadata.name, metadata.namespace, `metadata.labels['(KEY)']`, `metadata.annotations['(KEY)']`,
spec.nodeName, spec.serviceAccountName, status.hostIP, status.podIP, status.podIPs.

</summary>

<PartialFieldRefreference />


</details>
